description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nEternal Rest:
At the end of each enemy's turn, they have a 10% chance to be afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP}. At the start of this creature's turn, it {ACTION_attacks} each enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP} for 50% normal damage. This trait does not stack.
name: Blanket of Eternal Rest
